      • thenKeep

        public static <T,U> Function<Mono<T>,Mono<T>> thenKeep(Function<T,Mono<U>> thenFunction)
        Produces a Mono transformer that preserves the type of the source Mono<IN>.

        The Mono produced expects a single element from the source, passes this to the function (as in .then) and requests an element from the resulting Mono<OUT>. When successful, the result (if any) is discarded and input value is signalled.

        Summary: does a .then on the new Mono but keeps the input to pass on unchanged.

        Usage: Can be used inline thus: .as(thenKeep(in -> funcOf(in)))

        Type Parameters:
        T - the source element type
        U - the element type of the Mono produced by thenFunction
        Parameters:
        thenFunction - from source input element to some Mono<OUT>
        Returns:
        a Mono transformer
